section.title: Description
section.p: Represents an organization that has an interest in or may represent a Person, for example, a Veteran Service Organization.

"The name of the organization that serves as a next of kin/associated party or as the next of kin of the patient. This field may also be used to communicate the name of the organization at which the associated party works." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-13.

stentry.p: "The addresses of the contact person depending on the value of the relationship defined in NK1-3 - Relationship. This field is typically used when the NK1 is an organization." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-32.
"Address for the contact person." - HL7 FHIR, Patient.contact.address.
The date range during which this person is a contact party for the patient.
"The start date of the contact role." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-8.
"The end date of the contact role." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-9.
"The period during which this contact person or organization is valid to be contacted relating to this patient." - HL7 FHIR, Patient.contact.period.

"The name of the organization that serves as a next of kin/associated party or as the next of kin of the patient. This field may also be used to communicate the name of the organization at which the associated party works." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-13.
"Organization on behalf of which the contact is acting or for which the contact is working." - HL7 FHIR, Patient.contact.organization.

"Contains one or more of the names of the person to contact, depending on the value of the relationship defined in NK1-3 - Relationship. This field is typically needed when the NK1 is an organization." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-30.
"A name associated with the contact person." - HL7 FHIR, Patient.contact.name.

"The telephone numbers of the contact person depending on the value of the relationship defined in NK1-3 - Relationship. This field is typically needed when the NK1 is an organization." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-31.
"A contact detail for the person, e.g. a telephone number or an email address." - HL7 FHIR, Patient.contact.telecom.
